messages.title: THE PLANET IS IN YOUR HANDS
messages.content: VOTE GREEN TO TACKLE THE CLIMATE EMERGENCY NOW!

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ian has spent his career implementing action to combat climate change. This includes preventing energy waste in the public sector, installing renewable energy systems, and helping to run a small family farm that sets aside land for nature, benefiting Cornwall's climate and wildlife.

issues.environment: Ian Flindall has implemented action to combat climate change, including preventing energy waste in the public sector, installing renewable energy systems, and running a small family farm with a focus on environmental conservation.

quotes.text: Ian has spent his career implementing action to combat climate change. He has prevented energy waste in the public sector, installed renewable energy systems and helped to run a small family farm at Morvah, setting half the acreage aside for rare heathland plants and providing a home for the Cornish chough and other precious wildlife. Time is running out to avoid climate breakdown. This emergency demands that we mobilise – with our neighbours around the world – on the same scale as World War Two.

images.caption: Ian Flindall campaigning, with the slogan 'VOTE GREEN TO TACKLE THE CLIMATE EMERGENCY NOW!'

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet emphasizes Ian Flindall's environmental efforts and his focus on the climate emergency, reflecting the Green Party's priorities.
